scripts.docs:ts: typedoc --out docs/ts --entryPointStrategy expand src/server/ src/protocol/ src/services/ --tsconfig tsconfig.docs.json --skipErrorChecking
scripts.docs:rust: cd rust && cargo doc --no-deps --document-private-items --workspace && echo 'Docs at rust/target/doc/'
scripts.docs: bun run docs:ts && bun run docs:rust
scripts.docs:serve: bun run docs && echo '\nServing docs at http://localhost:8787' && bunx serve docs -l 8787
